entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
